movies.title: The Phoenician Scheme
movies.description: Wealthy businessman Zsa-zsa Korda appoints his only daughter Liesl, a nun, as sole heir to his estate. As Korda embarks on a new enterprise, they soon become the target of scheming tycoons, foreign terrorists and determined assassins. Directed by Wes Anderson, The Phoenician Scheme is a star-studded, is entertaining, humorous and visually striking with a surprisingly big heart.

movies.title: Materialists
movies.description: Lucy, a young, ambitious New York City matchmaker, finds herself torn between Harry, the perfect match, and her imperfect ex John, who's still in love with her. Thoughtful and insightful, Materialists delivers a refreshing take on dating in the modern world.

movies.title: How to train your dragon
movies.description: On the rugged isle of Berk, where Vikings and dragons have been bitter enemies for generations, Hiccup stands apart. Hiccup defies centuries of tradition when he befriends Toothless, a feared Night Fury dragon. Their unlikely bond reveals the true nature of dragons, challenging the very foundations of Viking society. This live-action reimagining of the animated classic How to Train Your Dragon is spectacular. A visually stunning, perfectly casted and emotionally engaging film that creates a thrilling movie theatre experience for the whole family.
